title: Bonnie and Clyde (1967)Faye Dunaway+Warren Beatty(Opt.MULTISUBS)
description:
Aka:

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0061418/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">

Optional subtitles in separate idx/sub files:
Croatian (Hrvatski), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, English for the hearing impaired, Finnish, French, Greek, German, Hebrew, Hungarian, Icelandic, Italian, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Spanish, Swedish, Turkish.

I just discovered that this all-time classic is no longer available as a smaller rip with multisubs, so I mad this for you. As often happen with so old films, the DVD has a slight grain, so I enclose a sample for ye weak in faith. But it IS color, and the original mono sound is unusually good. 

Widescreen color DVDrip XviD 2-pass 720x384, good original mono sound AC3.
Burn tested, runs well in both my standalone DivX players.
